trans-unit.source: A helper class that creates <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: 建立 helper 類別<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Once created, the DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator creates new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> instances, sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.InstanceId%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.SequenceId%2A> and increments the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.MessageNumber%2A> for each successive <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> instance created.
trans-unit.target: DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator 建立之後，建立新<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence>執行個體，設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.InstanceId%2A>，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.SequenceId%2A>並遞增<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.MessageNumber%2A>每個後續<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence>建立執行個體。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.MessageNumber%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.SequenceId%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.InstanceId%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator"></xref> class with the specified instance ID and sequence ID.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator"></xref>類別具有指定執行個體 ID 和序列 id。
